00020 #ifndef _XENO_ASM_PPC_ATOMIC_H
00021 #define _XENO_ASM_PPC_ATOMIC_H

00023 #include <asm/atomic.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00026 
00027 #include <linux/bitops.h>
00028 #include <asm/system.h>
00029 
00030 #define xnarch_atomic_xchg(ptr,v)       xchg(ptr,v)
00031 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()         smp_mb()
00032 
00033 void atomic_set_mask(unsigned long mask, /* from arch/ppc/kernel/misc.S */
00034                      unsigned long *ptr);
00035 
00036 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          atomic_set(pcounter,i)
00037 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            atomic_read(pcounter)
00038 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00039 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00040 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)
00041 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)
00042 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00043 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)
00044 
00045 #else /* !__KERNEL__ */
00046 
00047 #include <linux/config.h>
00048 
00049 #ifdef CONFIG_IBM405_ERR77
00050 #define PPC405_ERR77(ra,rb)     "dcbt " #ra "," #rb ";"
00051 #else
00052 #define PPC405_ERR77(ra,rb)
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Shamelessly lifted from <linux/asm-ppc/system.h>
00057  * and <linux/asm-ppc/atomic.h>
00058  */
00059 
00060 static inline unsigned long xnarch_atomic_xchg (volatile void *ptr,
00061                                                 unsigned long x)
00062 {
00063     unsigned long prev;
00064 
00065     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00066 1:      lwarx   %0,0,%2 \n"
00067         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2) \
00068 "       stwcx.  %3,0,%2 \n\
00069         bne-    1b"
00070         : "=&r" (prev), "=m" (*(volatile unsigned long *)ptr)
00071         : "r" (ptr), "r" (x), "m" (*(volatile unsigned long *)ptr)
00072         : "cc", "memory");
00073 
00074     return prev;
00075 }
00076 
00077 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00078 #define SMP_SYNC  "sync"
00079 #define SMP_ISYNC "\n\tisync"
00080 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00081 #define SMP_SYNC  ""
00082 #define SMP_ISYNC
00083 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00084 
00085 static __inline__ void atomic_inc(atomic_t *v)
00086 
00087 {
00088     int t;
00089 
00090     __asm__ __volatile__(
00091 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%2\n\
00092         addic   %0,%0,1\n"
00093         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2)
00094 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%2 \n\
00095         bne-    1b"
00096         : "=&r" (t), "=m" (v->counter)
00097         : "r" (&v->counter), "m" (v->counter)
00098         : "cc");
00099 }
00100 
00101 static __inline__ int atomic_inc_return(atomic_t *v)
00102 
00103 {
00104     int t;
00105 
00106     __asm__ __volatile__(
00107 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%1\n\
00108         addic   %0,%0,1\n"
00109         PPC405_ERR77(0,%1)
00110 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%1 \n\
00111         bne-    1b"
00112         SMP_ISYNC
00113         : "=&r" (t)
00114         : "r" (&v->counter)
00115         : "cc", "memory");
00116 
00117     return t;
00118 }
00119 
00120 static __inline__ void atomic_dec(atomic_t *v)
00121 
00122 {
00123     int t;
00124 
00125     __asm__ __volatile__(
00126 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%2\n\
00127         addic   %0,%0,-1\n"
00128         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2)\
00129 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%2\n\
00130         bne-    1b"
00131         : "=&r" (t), "=m" (v->counter)
00132         : "r" (&v->counter), "m" (v->counter)
00133         : "cc");
00134 }
00135 
00136 static __inline__ int atomic_dec_return(atomic_t *v)
00137 
00138 {
00139     int t;
00140 
00141     __asm__ __volatile__(
00142 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%1\n\
00143         addic   %0,%0,-1\n"
00144         PPC405_ERR77(0,%1)
00145 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%1\n\
00146         bne-    1b"
00147         SMP_ISYNC
00148         : "=&r" (t)
00149         : "r" (&v->counter)
00150         : "cc", "memory");
00151 
00152     return t;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static __inline__ void atomic_set_mask(unsigned long mask,
00156                                        unsigned long *ptr)
00157 {
00158     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00159 1:      lwarx   5,0,%0 \n\
00160         or      5,5,%1\n"
00161         PPC405_ERR77(0,%0) \
00162 "       stwcx.  5,0,%0 \n\
00163         bne-    1b"
00164         : /*no output*/
00165         : "r" (ptr), "r" (mask)
00166         : "r5", "cc", "memory");
00167 }
00168 
00169 static __inline__ void atomic_clear_mask(unsigned long mask,
00170                                          unsigned long *ptr)
00171 {
00172     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00173 1:      lwarx   5,0,%0 \n\
00174         andc    5,5,%1\n"
00175         PPC405_ERR77(0,%0) \
00176 "       stwcx.  5,0,%0 \n\
00177         bne-    1b"
00178         : /*no output*/
00179         : "r" (ptr), "r" (mask)
00180         : "r5", "cc", "memory");
00181 }
00182 
00183 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  __asm__ __volatile__("": : :"memory")
00184 
00185 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          (((pcounter)->counter) = (i))
00186 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            ((pcounter)->counter)
00187 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00188 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00189 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   (atomic_inc_return(pcounter) == 0)
00190 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   (atomic_dec_return(pcounter) == 0)
00191 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00192 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)
00193 
00194 #define cpu_relax()  xnarch_memory_barrier()
00195 
00196 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00197 
00198 typedef atomic_t atomic_counter_t;
00199 typedef unsigned long atomic_flags_t;

00201 #endif /* !_XENO_ASM_PPC_ATOMIC_H */
